properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v2 v3 v5

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: You broke the night like the sun newline And healed my Heart with your great Love newline Any trouble I couldn't bear newline You lifted me upon your shoulders

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Love thats stronger newline Love that covers sin newline and takes the weight of the world

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I love you newline All of my hope is in You newline Jesus Christ take my life take all of me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: You stand upon mountain tops with me newline With you I walk through the valleys newline You gave your only Son for me newline Your grace is all I rely on

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I love You so, And I give up my heart to say newline I need you so, My everything newline Oh Lord
